name: The Spider and the Bride
description:
There once was a large, old house that sat atop an equally large hill.

Within the old house’s attic there lived a spider.

Small and unassuming.

And every full moon, the house had a very special guest.

A short fairytale-esque story about a smitten little spider and the woman it loved.

Featuring approximately 3.5k words with 3 endings. 10-15 minutes for full completion.

Created as a submission for the 2021 Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam By DevTalk

Credits:
  • Made with Ren'Py
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Background Art by Brittany
  • Visual Overlay from https://www.myfreetextures.com
  • Special thanks to both Hollowmend and Brittany for their continued support!
